item.title: How does early stopping affect A/B experiment?
item.description: In the tech industry, we use controlled experiments to learn and make decisions at every step of product development, from design to algorithms. When the experiment is about a single change, such as changing the layout of the UI or using a different machine learning algorithm, the methodology is often called A/B testing. While is all fashionable and new to use A/B testing, the technique behind the scene, hypothesis testing, has been around for a long time.
